name: rattly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
likely to rattle (= make a series of knocking sounds), or making a rattling noise: The bus was a rattly old double-decker, packed with local people. It's very different from the rattly lifts of our old apartment block.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen it started to rain, we all crouched under a huge, rattly plastic sheet.The town can be reached by a charming, rattly train from Palma. It's noisier and rattlier in the cab than in the passenger compartment. There are many ways to keep rattly old windows in good working order.
